graphql_operation_files.content: mutation Chat__CreateOne($text: String!, $parentMessageId: Int, $chatId: Int!)@internalOperation {data: grace_createOneChatMessage(data: {text: $text,parentMessageId: $parentMessageId,History: {connect: {id: $chatId}}}){id text parentMessageId createdAt chatId}}
query Chat__GetByHistory($historyId: Int = 10)@internalOperation {data: grace_findManyChatMessage(where: {History: {is: {id: {equals: $historyId}}}}){id text parentMessageId}}
query Chat__GetList @internalOperation {data: grace_findManyChatMessage {id text parentMessageId createdAt chatId}}
mutation Chat__UpdateChatText($text: String!, $id: Int!)@internalOperation {grace_upsertOneChatMessage(create: {text: $text,History: {}}, update: {}, where: {id: $id}){id}}

mutation History__CreateOne($title: String!, $userId: String! @fromClaim(name: USERID) ){data: grace_createOneHistory(data: {title: $title,User: {connect: {id: $userId}}}){id title createdAt updatedAt}}
query History__GetList($userId: String! @fromClaim(name: USERID) ){data: grace_findManyHistory(where: {User: {is: {id: {equals: $userId}}}}){id title createdAt updatedAt}}
mutation History__UpdateOne($id: Int!, $title: String){data: grace_updateOneHistory(data: {title: {set: $title}}, where: {id: $id}){id title createdAt updatedAt}}

mutation Propmt__CreateOne($prompt: String!, $title: String!, $userId: String! @fromClaim(name: USERID) ){data: grace_createOnePrompt(data: {prompt: $prompt,title: $title,User: {connect: {id: $userId}}}){id prompt title createdAt updatedAt}}

query Propmt__GetList($take: Int = 10, $skip: Int = 0, $orderBy: [grace_PromptOrderByWithRelationInput], $query: grace_PromptWhereInput){data: grace_findManyPrompt(skip: $skip, take: $take, orderBy: $orderBy, where: {AND: $query}){id prompt title createdAt updatedAt} total: grace_aggregatePrompt(where: {AND: $query})@transform(get: "_count.id") {_count {id}}}

mutation Propmt__UpdateOne($id: Int!, $prompt: String, $title: String, $updatedAt: DateTime! @injectCurrentDateTime(format: UnixDate) ){data: grace_updateOnePrompt(data: {prompt: {set: $prompt},title: {set: $title},updatedAt: {set: $updatedAt}}, where: {id: $id}){id prompt title createdAt updatedAt}}

mutation User__CreateOneUser($avatar: String!, $description: String!, $id: String!, $name: String!, $provider: String = "", $providerId: String = "")@internalOperation {data: grace_createOneUser(data: {id: $id,name: $name,avatar: $avatar,description: $description,provider: $provider,providerId: $providerId}){id}}
query User__GetOneUser($id: String = "")@internalOperation {data: grace_findFirstUser(where: {id: {equals: $id}}){id description avatar name}}
query User__Me($equals: String! @fromClaim(name: USERID) ){data: grace_findFirstUser(where: {id: {equals: $equals}}){avatar description id name}}

mutation User__UpdateInfo($id: String! @fromClaim(name: USERID), $name: String = "", $description: String = "", $avatar: String = ""){data: grace_updateOneUser(where: {id: $id}, data: {name: {set: $name},description: {set: $description},avatar: {set: $avatar}}){id name description avatar}}
